document_data.name: Frozen Sea
document_data.mainbody: The '''Frozen Sea''' was one of the regions of [[Anauroch]], the great desert of [[Faerûn]], located on its western edge.
document_data.Description: The Frozen Sea was the part of Anauroch lying west of the [[High Ice]]. Here, where that massive glacier ended gave rise instead to the hard ground of frozen [[sand]]. The place was a maze of natural sand sculptures, shaped by the wind and frozen by the cold. The area was void of any water or ice.
document_data.Flora & Fauna: In springtime, life briefly appeared in the Frozen Sea, as low-growing ground plants briefly grew. During this time many varieties of birds would fly here to breed. Outside this narrow time, little life could be found here.
document_data.History: Before the magical formation of Anauroch, the great [[Narrow Sea]] filled this region. When the waters left, the basin that remained behind became the Frozen Sea.

Notable Locations.[[Ascore]]: The ruins of this [[Dwarf|dwarven]] port still contained ships of stone.
Notable Locations.[[Hlaungadath]]: This was one of the fallen cities of ancient [[Netheril]].
Notable Locations.[[Oreme]]: This was once a Netherese port on the edge of the Narrow Sea.
Notable Locations.[[Spellgard]]: A grand castle located on a rocky ridge that was the abode of Lady [[Saharel]], High Mage of Netheril.
